{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Mona
|time               = 2022-08-31
|zh                 = 
;今天是莫娜的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''莫娜：'''是你们啊，早上好…
:'''派蒙：'''莫娜，生日快乐…
:'''派蒙：'''哇，你的黑眼圈好严重！
:'''莫娜：'''欸，今天已经是我的生日了？
:'''莫娜：'''我昨晚通宵写稿来着，不知不觉天就亮了，家里也没收拾，乱糟糟的，真是不好意思…
:'''派蒙：'''好啦好啦，你快去休息，其他的事情就交给我们吧~
|dialogue_review_zh = 欸，今天已经是我的生日了？
|en                 =
;Today is [[Mona]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Mona:''' Ah, it's you two. Good morning...
:'''Paimon:''' Mona! Happy birthday...
:'''Paimon:''' Whoa, you've got some pretty serious shadows under your eyes!
:'''Mona:''' Huh, it's my birthday already?
:'''Mona:''' I stayed up all night writing my manuscript. I didn't even realize it was already morning! I haven't tidied up my house either, everything's a mess. This is embarrassing...
:'''Paimon:''' Alright, alright, go and rest! Leave the rest to us~
|dialogue_review_en = Huh, it's my birthday already?
}}
